summary: This document is a series of official inmate count slips and a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records the official inmate census and verification counts taken at different times that day, showing a total inmate population of 758. The document is significant as it provides a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording a total census of 758 inmates. The counts were verified at different times, including 01:20:48 and 00:35:17.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, which is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet, recording a total inmate census of 758 at the MCC.
The count was verified at multiple times, including 01:20:48 and 00:35:17, indicating routine security procedures were being followed.
The document itself contains no named individuals, only administrative data related to inmate population counts.
This type of record would be part of the standard prison documentation for the date of Epstein's death.
